news.title: County Commission Approves New Business Development Zone
news.excerpt: The Fayette County Commission voted unanimously to approve a new business development zone that will bring jobs and economic growth to our community.
news.content: In a landmark decision, the Fayette County Commission voted unanimously to approve a new business development zone...
news.author: John Smith

news.title: Local Republicans Lead Voter Registration Drive
news.excerpt: Over 500 new voters registered during last weekend's successful voter registration drive organized by the Fayette County GOP.
news.content: The Fayette County Republican Party's voter registration drive exceeded all expectations...
news.author: Jane Doe

news.title: State Representative Visits Fayette County Schools
news.excerpt: State Rep. Mike Johnson toured local schools to discuss education reform and hear directly from teachers, parents, and students.
news.content: State Representative Mike Johnson spent the day visiting three Fayette County schools...
news.author: Bob Wilson
